publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3475 Margaret Smith: Parenting Across Scotland—That the Parliament recognises the diverse nature of family life in Scotland; acknowledges the difficulties faced by parents in light of personal and professional pressures; notes the importance of good family relationships for the health, well-being and achievement of parents and their children; congratulates parents for the work that they do in raising the next generation of Scottish citizens, and congratulates Parenting Across Scotland for its efforts to highlight and celebrate the role of parenting both during National Parents’ Week and beyond.

S2M-3475 Parenting Across Scotland (lodged on 26 October 2005) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Jackie Baillie*, Susan Deacon*, Bruce Crawford*, Sarah Boyack*, Mike Pringle*, Patrick Harvie*, Mike Rumbles*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Eleanor Scott*, Marlyn Glen*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Ms Sandra White*, Alex Johnstone*, Scott Barrie*, Mr Brian Monteith*

S2M-3475 Margaret Smith: Parenting Across Scotland—That the Parliament recognises the diverse nature of family life in Scotland; acknowledges the difficulties faced by parents in light of personal and professional pressures; notes the importance of good family relationships for the health, well-being and achievement of parents and their children; congratulates parents for the work that they do in raising the next generation of Scottish citizens, and congratulates Parenting Across Scotland for its efforts to highlight and celebrate the role of parenting both during National Parents’ Week and beyond. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Jackie Baillie, Susan Deacon, Bruce Crawford, Sarah Boyack, Mike Pringle, Patrick Harvie, Mike Rumbles, Fiona Hyslop, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Eleanor Scott, Marlyn Glen, Mrs Nanette Milne, Mr David Davidson, Mr Jim Wallace, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Ms Sandra White, Alex Johnstone, Scott Barrie, Mr Brian Monteith, Chris Ballance*, John Scott*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-3475 Parenting Across Scotland (lodged on 26 October 2005) Shiona Baird*, Trish Godman*
S2M-3475 Parenting Across Scotland (lodged on 26 October 2005) John Swinburne*, Cathy Peattie*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-3475 Parenting Across Scotland (lodged on 26 October 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3475 Parenting Across Scotland (lodged on 26 October 2005) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S2M-3475 Parenting Across Scotland (lodged on 26 October 2005) Elaine Smith*
S2M-3475 Parenting Across Scotland (lodged on 26 October 2005) Frances Curran*
